name: Cherry Bomb (Emilila)
description:
Cherry Bomb

This is my entry for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3. Also, this is the first game jam I've ever completed! :)
I hope you enjoy this little arcade game where the walls turn ON and OFF!

How to play

- In order to start playing you must click on the game.
- Move with WASD or Arrow Keys.
- Your objective is to collect as many coins and cherries as you can without blowing up!
- Once you have collected 3 cherries, press [space] to force all the walls to switch from OFF to ON or ON to OFF! This can be helpful to get out of a jam. ;)

Have fun!
